title: Running Chaos Scenarios on Remote Clusters
summary:
In this tutorial, you will learn how to create Chaos Scenarios on a remote cluster. 
First, you will learn to deploy your own remote cluster on GKE(Google Kubernetes Engine), then you will install a CLI tool called litmusctl. Next, you will use litmusctl to target this remote cluster chaos delegate. Finally, you will schedule a predefined chaos scenario on this remote cluster.
